participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and creative, always looking for inspiration in her surroundings.
participant_1.background: I was raised in a small town where the people were friendly and the food was delicious. I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I am a YouTuber who enjoys sharing my love of cooking with others. My favorite place to go is the mall. My home is in Pittsburgh, where I am able to find inspiration and capture the beauty of the city through my camera.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and determined, always trying to improve and make the most of life.
participant_2.background: I love the freedom of driving my moped around town. I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways. Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab. I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day. I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.

content.text: Just got home from a long day in the city.  I love the freedom of driving my moped around town, but the traffic can be a real pain.
Traffic can be really annoying, I know what you mean.  I live in a smaller city and I like it that way.
I grew up in a small town but now I live in Toronto.  The summers are crazy, but I love the energy!
I can imagine!  I love the energy of a big city.  Do you have any fun summer plans?
I'm going to be spending some time with my family and friends.  We're going to go camping and horseback riding.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm jealous.
I'd love to, but I have a lot of work to do.  Maybe next time!
